name: Budget Meka
description:
• Mum can we have a Meka?
• We have a Meka at home.
• *The Meka at home*

When a Meka is way out of your budget, so you build one yourself. Its the same thing right? Right?

A tribute to @MekaVerse

Always have been a big fan of MekaVerse's aesthetics. It's clean, polished, and so enjoyable to look at. Unfortunately it's out of reach, maybe one day.
